snippet.title: CounterAttack Trailer 2020
snippet.description:
https://www.microsoft.com/store/apps/9ND0QV2NQRM0

https://store.steampowered.com/app/451600

8 Player online coop, 4 player local coop, Cross platform multiplayer, 500+ attachments to customize your ship, 32 levels + infinite survival, and 8 ships with unique ultimate abilities.

CounterAttack is a side scrolling space shooter that builds on the classic formula by adding weapon customization, great online multiplayer, and a choose your own path campaign mode.
